question: Who won the men’s singles title at the All England Open Badminton Championships 2019?
explanation: Kento Momota has become the first Japanese man to win the All England Open Badminton Championships when he beat Denmark’s Viktor Axelsen 2-1 in the men’s singles final at the Birmingham Arena. Beside this, Chen Yufei of China won the women’s title by upsetting  world No.1 Tai Tzu Ying of Taiwan in straight games, 21-17, 21-17.
